content.query:
-- -- Create db
-- CREATE DATABASE db_name;

-- -- External data source
-- CREATE EXTERNAL DATA SOURCE [ExternalDataSource] WITH
-- (
-- 	LOCATION = 'https://<STORAGEACCOUNT>.blob.core.windows.net/<CONTAINER>'
-- )

-- -- Schema
-- CREATE SCHEMA schema_name AUTHORIZATION dbo;

-- -- Master key in db
-- CREATE MASTER KEY ENCRYPTION BY PASSWORD = 'my_password';

-- -- Credential to allow AD authentication
-- CREATE DATABASE SCOPED CREDENTIAL SynapseUserIdentity WITH IDENTITY = 'User Identity';


-- ALTER DATABASE db_name COLLATE Latin1_General_100_BIN2_UTF8;

-- CREATE EXTERNAL FILE FORMAT ParquetFormat WITH
-- (
-- 	FORMAT_TYPE = PARQUET
-- )
